title: pbe account
body: i wait 1 year  and i havent got my pbe account yet. i dont  understand i  dont troll and i never have been baned why riro why :(

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, your length in the invite queue isn't a factor in getting chosen. We look for really active players that are a positive influence on the community. Sometimes we'll send batches of invites out if we're looking to test a particular thing and certain players would test it best.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for complete details on the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Getting into the PBE is like winning a lottery and isn't based on how long someone has applied for it.
